channel.title: Lamboginny Music World - SALT
channel.description: Recent content on Lamboginny Music World - SALT

item.title: Creating a new theme
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme. We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You have something to say? We look forward to hearing from you and will respond as soon as possible.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: 1. How did you get the name Lamboginny? That started from the fact that he was a marine engineer and he was always travelling. When he was home he would like ot relax and I would be all over him. One day he was trying to distract me and sent me to do some chores, the speed at which I did them and came back made him ask if I was now as fast as a Lamborghini automobile.

item.title: Music
item.description: Follow on Spotify Stream on Spotify [Click here to see all streaming options](https://lamboginny.fanlink.to/Salt) SALT is Lamboginny’s debut album as an indepenent artist and was released in October 2017 at the Kirikiri medium security prison in Lagos Nigeria. 1 - Intro - Sea Sound - Featuring DJ Jimmy Jatt 2 - Salt - Produced by STO 3 - KorKor - Featureing Korede Bello - Produced by Bennie Maccauly 4 - Read My Lips - Featuring Olamide - Produced by STO 5 - Hustle & Pray - Produced by STO 6 - Keep On Moving - Featuring Muna - Produced by STO 7 - Blessed - Produced by STO 8 - Yebo - Featuring Mr.
